content:
1020 Is Treason still a thing? Because if it is, we should have seen a LOT of arrests! posted 1 day ago by CatalystForChange 90 comments award share report block General Mike Flynn @GenFlynn • 1d . @POTUS @realDonaldTrump speaking for myself only, I would be fine if you arrested @BarackObama for TREASON. If what @DNIGabbard says is accurate, you have as your constitutional duty the authority to arrest him. Make America Great Again! Happy Veteran’s Day 🙏🏼🇺🇸 Jim Ferguson @JimFergusonUK • 3d 🚨 TULSI GABBARD: “OBAMA ORDERED THE OVERTHROW OF THE U.S. GOVERNMENT” 🚨 🔥 Only 38 seconds — and it changes everything. Former DNI Tulsi Gabbard just said it out loud: “Barack Hussein Obama ordered the overthrow of the United States government — on behalf of Hillary Clinton
90 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save NotYourMan 67 points 1 day ago So much evidence, so few arrests! permalink award report block reply Steve56775 36 points 1 day ago And Bondi is STILL the AG. permalink parent award report block reply MAG_n_KAG 14 points 20 hours ago That's because she's doing a great job! 👍👍 permalink parent award report block reply EgregiousPhilbin 7 points 20 hours ago Sessions is advising her behind the scenes permalink parent award report block reply The_Return_of_User_x 7 points 23 hours ago "Barry is on the Epstein list..." Let's see if this speeds up the release of the Epstein list or slows down the prosecution of Obama. permalink parent award report block reply SupFrens 6 points 20 hours ago Trump is looking weak for not firing her. permalink parent award report block reply BigMikesChef 4 points 19 hours ago Extremely. She's wasted so much time. permalink parent award report block reply Awakened 4 points 19 hours ago She works for Trump and is doing what he wants. He keeps saying how pleased he is with her. It really isn't her fault. It's Trumps and we all gotta come to grips with that. permalink parent award report block reply makersmarx 1 points 19 hours ago Then why is he always begging her to do stuff? She may answer to someone else. 3 bad AGs in a row while Garland went after MAGA hard permalink parent award report block reply Awakened 5 points 18 hours ago Trump's the one who's saying she's doing great, not me. permalink parent award report block reply LoneWolf_86 8 points 1 day ago Zero, to be exact. permalink parent award report block reply PROCIsAsshoe -1 points 19 hours ago Comey and Bolton already were arrested. So, no, you're wrong. And Clapper and Brennan coming soon. You probably believe the lie that Obama and Biden deported more people. Or maybe you don't believe it but you say it anyway because ultimately, the goal is to make Trump look bad. permalink parent award report block reply snoopy3210 1 points 23 hours ago That’s not even true. What they did is they EXAGGERATED the Russian influence after losing the election
AND they sent CIA / MI6 agents (Carter Page, Chris Steele, Halper) to falsely LINK the Trump campaign to Russia. Carter Page went to Russia in July 2016
as a member of Trump campaign when Steele was spreading lies about the Trump-Russia COLLUSION to the FBI. The CIA MI6 wanted the FBI to be triggered and to announce an investigation into the Trump campaign to make voters think there was something shady about Trump. Tulsi is helping the CIA turning it into simple Russian interference, but thats not the coup. The coup is the MI6 and CIA fabricated Russia COLLUSION. permalink parent award report block reply Daffy 0 points 20 hours ago Yeah, but two more weeks. permalink parent award report block reply load 2 more comments... Thats all our side does now, stompy foot tweeting and hopium chasing, and calling others doomers for seeing reality, that 1 year of this administration has not delivered on its campaign promises to MAGA, but spent its time delivering for other countries. Who is the enemies and in a constitutional law sense this means foreign nations. Not people who aren't real Americans or people that like blue hair. Nothing. permalink award report block reply 1LoathsomeDove 1 points 9 hours ago Ya know ...
In my frontier subdivision, it took 5 LOA (landowners association) Directors over a year to bring a rogue secretary/treasurer to heel.
The Articles of Incorporation dictated that the LOA was a "road maintenance" association.  Nothing more. For over a decade, voting for Officers was in violation of the Community Documents and state statute. It took a year before we retrieved our LOA's records from being (illegally) stored in another state.  The day after they were returned, the Sheriff arrived to ask us about our 'theft' of those records. I called the rogue director 'a flea' and said the board was tired of scratching the itch and going forward I would squish any fleas instead of entertaining their circus.  Sheriff arrived to discuss my 'death threat'. It took a year for us to stop payments for maintenance and repairs for a 'community well' when our truth in lending disclosure clearly stated, 'Community Well: N/A" & 'Owners must dig their own well' and to return to an unedited 'plat map'.
(edited in violation of statute). Bondi et.al. face a rogue BoD ... infinity. Slow and steady.  Do you want it fast or do you want it right? Interestingly, the Director that originally objected to payment for a community well (starting the year-long battle) ... went rogue himself.
